item.description:
By popular request, and to vary things from the usual night at Union Station, let's head to Spat's for an evening of trivia.

Come on out, socialize and dazzle your fellow newcomer's with esoteric knowledge of music, movies, celebrities, television, history and many other topics.

Trivia game takes about 2 hours to run, starts at 9, come a little early if you'd like dinner.

I may be running a little late, as I have a meeting before this event, but will strive to get there early enough to get a table large enough.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a sign and try to stake out a couple of tables
item.name: Monday Night Trivia @ Spat's
